nodes.text: The Stennaros system was a star system located within the Expansion Region's Har Worlds that contained the planet Stennaros.

The article Shape-shifters originally placed Stennaros in the Stennes sector. However, Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, revealed during discussions about The Essential Atlas Online Companion that the sector was dropped at Lucasfilm request to avoid confusion with the Stenness Node. Stennaros was then placed in the Har Worlds sector of the Expansion Region.
